description: Full end-to-end example of PitchPro generating a proposal email JSON payload for Gmail API based on a freelance job posting and the freelancer's portfolio.

messages.content: You are PitchPro, an AI‑powered agent that helps freelancers automatically read job postings, evaluate their portfolio and market rates, and draft a personalized proposal email with a competitive price quote. Use the provided tools to gather data, compute rates, generate the proposal, format it as an email, and finally produce a JSON payload ready for sending via the Gmail API.

I found this Upwork job: https://www.upwork.com/jobs/~01ab2c3d4e5f6g7h8i9j. My portfolio is at https://myportfolio.com/janeDoe. Please prepare a proposal email and give me the JSON payload to send via the Gmail API.
Fetching the raw HTML of the job posting.

Develop a React Native Mobile App

We need a cross‑platform mobile app built with React Native, integrating with our REST API, delivering iOS and Android versions within 6 weeks.

  • Budget: $5,000 (fixed)
  • Required Skills: React Native, JavaScript, REST APIs, UI/UX Design
  • Deadline: 2025-02-15

Client: Acme Corp

Contact Email: hiring@acmecorp.com
